title: Rocking Socks & Sandals With the Bedrock Mountain Clogs
content:
Based out of Missoula, Montana, Bedrock Sandals releases the perfect follow-up to its open-toed adventure sandal with the Mountain Clogs.

The post Rocking Socks & Sandals With the Bedrock Mountain Clogs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ron Frazelle
